subsections.title: Introduction to DeepCode
subsections.content: DeepCode is an AI-powered code review tool that uses machine learning to find bugs and suggest improvements in your code. It integrates seamlessly with popular IDEs, providing real-time feedback and suggestions as you code.

subsections.title: Integrating DeepCode with an IDE
subsections.content: To utilize DeepCode, you first need to integrate it with your preferred IDE. This subsection will guide you through the process of installing and setting up DeepCode in popular IDEs like IntelliJ IDEA and Visual Studio Code.

quizzes.question: Which IDEs can DeepCode be integrated with?
options: IntelliJ IDEA, Visual Studio Code, and more
quizzes.answer: IntelliJ IDEA, Visual Studio Code, and more

subsections.title: Using DeepCode for Code Review
subsections.content: Once DeepCode is set up in your IDE, you can start using it for code reviews. This subsection covers how to run a code review session, interpret DeepCode suggestions, and make your code more robust.
